original_text: Several inorganic flocculating agents, including FeSO4, Al2(SO4)3, FeCl3 and an organic coagulant aid PAM, were used to treat the wastewater from domestic anima and poultry breeding in this paper. The ideal operating conditions were attained by single factor experiment and orthogonal design experiment. And the ideal operating conditions are follows: the dose of FeSO4 and PAM is 135.2mg/L and 0.384mg/L respectively when keeping the pH 10; and the corresponding removal rate is 55% and 60% for COD and turbidity. Based on the experimental results, this paper analyzes the main factors that affect wastewater flocculation treatment.
original_translation: Varios agentes floculantes inorgánicos, incluyendo FeSO4, Al2(SO4)3, FeCl3 y un coadyuvante coagulante orgánico PAM, fueron utilizados para tratar las aguas residuales de la cría doméstica de animales y aves de corral en este artículo. Las condiciones ideales de operación fueron alcanzadas mediante experimentos de un solo factor y diseño ortogonal. Y las condiciones de operación ideales son las siguientes: la dosis de FeSO4 y PAM es de 135.2mg/L y 0.384mg/L respectivamente al mantener un pH de 10; y la tasa de eliminación correspondiente es del 55% y 60% para DQO y turbidez. Basándose en los resultados experimentales, este artículo analiza los principales factores que afectan al tratamiento de floculación de aguas residuales.
original_sentences: Several inorganic flocculating agents, including FeSO4, Al2(SO4)3, FeCl3 and an organic coagulant aid PAM, were used to treat the wastewater from domestic anima and poultry breeding in this paper.
The ideal operating conditions were attained by single factor experiment and orthogonal design experiment.

And the ideal operating conditions are follows: the dose of FeSO4 and PAM is 135.2mg/L and 0.384mg/L respectively when keeping the pH 10; and the corresponding removal rate is 55% and 60% for COD and turbidity.
Based on the experimental results, this paper analyzes the main factors that affect wastewater flocculation treatment.

wastewater flocculation treatment.translated_key: tratamiento de floculación de aguas residuales
original_annotated_sentences: Several inorganic flocculating agents, including FeSO4, Al2(SO4)3, FeCl3 and an organic coagulant aid PAM, were used to treat the wastewater from domestic anima and poultry breeding in this paper.
The ideal operating conditions were attained by single factor experiment and orthogonal design experiment.

And the ideal operating conditions are follows: the dose of FeSO4 and PAM is 135.2mg/L and 0.384mg/L respectively when keeping the pH 10; and the corresponding removal rate is 55% and 60% for COD and turbidity.

Based on the experimental results, this paper analyzes the main factors that affect
wastewater flocculation treatment
.
original_annotated_samples:
Based on the experimental results, this paper analyzes the main factors that affect
wastewater flocculation treatment
.
translated_annotated_samples:
Output: Basándose en los resultados experimentales, este documento analiza los principales factores que afectan el
tratamiento de floculación de aguas residuales
.
wastewater flocculation treatment.translated_text:
Varios agentes floculantes inorgánicos, incluyendo FeSO4, Al2(SO4)3, FeCl3 y un coadyuvante coagulante orgánico PAM, fueron utilizados para tratar las aguas residuales de la cría doméstica de animales y aves de corral en este artículo. Las condiciones ideales de operación fueron alcanzadas mediante experimentos de un solo factor y diseño ortogonal. Y las condiciones de operación ideales son las siguientes: la dosis de FeSO4 y PAM es de 135.2mg/L y 0.384mg/L respectivamente al mantener un pH de 10; y la tasa de eliminación correspondiente es del 55% y 60% para DQO y turbidez. Output: Basándose en los resultados experimentales, este documento analiza los principales factores que afectan el
tratamiento de floculación de aguas residuales
.
